DataElement.preferredName: Patient Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Likelihood of Cancer Cure 7 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how likely they think it is that they will be cured of cancer, using a 7 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Likelihood of Cancer Cure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care._A question about how likely a person thinks the patient's cancer cure will be.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Patient Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.
A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about how likely a person thinks the patient's cancer cure will be.

Concepts.definition: A question about how likely a person thinks the patient's cancer cure will be.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PTPQ:Prognosis and Treatment Perceptions Questionnaire as referenced in Associations Among Prognostic Understanding, Quality of Life, El-Jawahri A, et.al., 2014
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 5/28/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard with seven text responses related to how likely it is that an individual will be cured of cancer from extremely likely (more than a 90% chance of cure) to no chance of a cure.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.: The possibility or likelihood that something will happen.: Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.
The possibility or likelihood that something will happen.
Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy.

PermissibleValues.value: Very unlikely (less than 10% chance of cure)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Existing to a great degree.: Having little chance of being the case or of coming about.

Concepts.definition: Having little chance of being the case or of coming about.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Having little chance of being the case or of coming about.

Concepts.definition: Having little chance of being the case or of coming about.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.
Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme.
Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Existing to a great degree.: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.

Concepts.definition: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.

PermissibleValues.value: Extremely likely (more than a 90% chance of cure)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The highest degree of severity.: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.

Concepts.definition: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 5/28/14
